summary: NAR 03/05/2003  THE CONSUMER VEHICLE HAS BEEN OUT OF SERVICE AT LEAST 20 CUMULATIVE DAYS TO REPAIR ONE OR MORE MALFUNCTIONS OR CONDITIONS THAT CAUSE THE VEHICLE NOT TO CONFORM TO THE WARRANTY. THREE OR MORE REPAIR ATTEMPTS HAVE BEEN MADE TO REPAIR THE SAME DEFECT AND CONDITION.   THE CONSUMER NO LONGER WANTS THE VEHICLE. *CB
